## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1651">불가리아 uniform의 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1651">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1652">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1652">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1653">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1653">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1654">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1654">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1655">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1655">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1656">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1656">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1657">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1657">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1658">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1659">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1659">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1661">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1661">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1662">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1662">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1663">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1663">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1664">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 1자리 숫자와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1664">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1665">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1665">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1666">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1667">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1667">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1669">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1670">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1670">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1671">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1671">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1673">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1718">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1718">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1719">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1720">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1720">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1722">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1722">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1723">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1727">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1727">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1728">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1729">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1729">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1731">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1731">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1732">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1752">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1752">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1753">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1754">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1754">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1755">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1756">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1756">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1757">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1757">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1758">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1758">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1759">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1759">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1760">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1760">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1761">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1761">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1762">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1763">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1764">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1767">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1767">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1768">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1768">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1769">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1769">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1770">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1771">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1771">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1772">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1772">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1773">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1774">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1774">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1775">canada savings bonds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1775">canada savings bonds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1776">canada revenue agency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1776">canada revenue agency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1777">canadian financial institution</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1777">canadian financial institution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1778">direct deposit form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1778">direct deposit form</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1779">canadian citizen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1779">canadian citizen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1780">legal representative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1780">legal representative</span></span>

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1796">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1796">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1797">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1798">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1798">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1800">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1800">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1801">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1802">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1804">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1805">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1805">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1806">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1806">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1807">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1807">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1943">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1943">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1944">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1945">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1945">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1946">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1946">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1947">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1947">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1948">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1949">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1949">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1950">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1951">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1952">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1952">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1953">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1953">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1954">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1954">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1956">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1956">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1957">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1957">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1958">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1958">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1959">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1959">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1960">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1960">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1961">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1961">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1962">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1962">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1963">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1963">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1964">disability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1964">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1965">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1965">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1966">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1967">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1967">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1968">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1968">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1969">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1969">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1970">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1970">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1971">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1971">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1972">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1972">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1973">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1973">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1974">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1974">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-1975">검색된 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-1975">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2005">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2005">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2006">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2006">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2007">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2007">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2008">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2008">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2009">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2009">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2010">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2011">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2011">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2012">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2013">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2013">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2014">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2014">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2015">검색된 키워드 또는 Keyword_canada_phin 키워드가 Keyword_canada_provinces 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2015">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2048">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2048">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2049">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2050">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2050">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2051">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2052">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2052">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2053">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2054">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2054">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2055">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2055">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2056">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2056">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2057">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2057">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2058">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2058">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2059">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2060">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2061">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2062">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2063">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2063">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2064">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2064">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2065">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2065">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2066">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2066">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2067">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2067">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2068">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2070">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2070">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2071">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2071">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2072">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2072">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2088">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2088">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2095">생일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2095">Birthday</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2096">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2096">Date of Birth</span></span> 

   
## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2097">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2097">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2098">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2099">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 세분화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2099">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2100">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2101">7-8자리 숫자와 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2101">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2102">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2102">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2103">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2103">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2104">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2104">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2105">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2105">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2106">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2106">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2107">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2107">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2108">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2108">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2109">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2110">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2110">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2111">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2112">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2112">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2113">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2113">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2114">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2114">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2115">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2116">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2116">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2117">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2117">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2118">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2155">중국 상주 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2155">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2157">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2157">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2159">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2159">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2160">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2160">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2161">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2161">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2162">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2162">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2163">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2163">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2164">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2165">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2166">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2167">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2167">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2168">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2168">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2169">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2169">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2170">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2171">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2172">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2173">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2174">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2174">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2175">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2175">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2176">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2176">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2177">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2177">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2178">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2178">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2179">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2179">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2180">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2180">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2181">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2181">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2182">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2182">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2183">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2183">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2184">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2184">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2185">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2185">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2186">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2186">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2187">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2188">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddd) 및 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2188">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2189">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2190">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2190">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2192">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2192">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2195">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2195">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2196">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2196">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2197">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2197">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2198">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2198">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2199">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2199">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2200">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2201">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2202">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2202">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2203">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2204">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2204">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_cc_verification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2205">Keyword_cc_verification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2205">Keyword_cc_verification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2206">card verification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2206">card verification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2207">card identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2207">card identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2208">cvn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2208">cvn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2209">cid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2209">cid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2210">cvc2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2210">cvc2</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2211">cvv2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2211">cvv2</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2212">pin block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2212">pin block</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2463">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2463">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2464">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2465">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2465">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2466">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2467">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2467">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2468">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2469">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2469">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2470">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2471">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2472">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2472">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2473">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2473">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

          </Any>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2597">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2597">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2598">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2598">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2599">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2600">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2601">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2602">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2602">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2603">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2604">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2604">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2605">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2606">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2607">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2607">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2608">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2608">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2639">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2639">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2641">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2641">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2643">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2643">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2644">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2645">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2648">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2648">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2649">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2650">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2652">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2653">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2671">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2671">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2672">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2673">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2673">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2675">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2675">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2676">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2676">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2677">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2677">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2678">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2679">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2680">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2681">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2682">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2682">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2683">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2683">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2684">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2685">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2686">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2687">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2697">osobni id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2697">osobni id</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2718">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2718">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2719">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2720">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2720">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2722">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2722">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2723">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2727">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2727">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2728">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2853">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2853">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2854">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2854">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2855">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2855">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2856">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2856">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2857">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2857">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2858">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2858">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2859">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2859">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2860">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2861">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2861">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2862">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2863">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2863">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2864">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2865">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2865">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2868">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2868">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2869">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2869">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2870">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2870">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2872">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2872">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2873">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2873">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2874">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2874">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2875">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2875">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2876">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2876">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2878">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2878">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2879">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2880">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2880">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2881">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2882">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2882">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2883">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2884">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2884">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2886">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2887">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2887">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2888">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2888">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2889">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2889">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2890">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2891">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2892">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2921">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2921">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2922">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2922">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2923">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2923">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2924">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2924">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2925">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2925">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2926">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2926">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2927">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2927">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2928">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2929">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2929">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2930">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2931">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2931">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2932">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2932">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2933">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2933">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2934">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2934">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2935">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2936">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2936">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2937">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2938">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2939">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2939">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2940">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2940">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2941">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2941">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2942">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2942">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
