## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2970">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2970">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2971">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2972">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2972">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2974">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2974">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2975">문자 'E'(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2975">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2976">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2976">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2977">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2977">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2978">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2978">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2980">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2982">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2983">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2983">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-2984">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-2984">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3110">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3110">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3111">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3112">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3112">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3114">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3114">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3115">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3119">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3119">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3120">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3120">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3121">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3121">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3122">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3123">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3124">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3146">체코어 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3146">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3147">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3148">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식) 10자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3148">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3150">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3150">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3151">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3151">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3152">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3152">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3153">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3154">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3154">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3155">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3156">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3157">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3157">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3158">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3161">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3162">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3162">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3163">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3163">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3164">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3165">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3166">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3167">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3214">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3214">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3215">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3216">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3216">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3217">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3218">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3218">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3219">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3220">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3223">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3223">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3224">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3348">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3348">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3349">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3350">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3350">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3352">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3352">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3353">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3354">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3357">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3357">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3358">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3359">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3360">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3361">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3362">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3382">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3382">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3383">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3384">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3384">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3386">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3386">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3387">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3387">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3388">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3388">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3389">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3389">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3390">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3391">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3391">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3394">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3394">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3395">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3395">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3396">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3396">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3397">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3398">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3399">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3399">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3471">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3471">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3472">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3473">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3473">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3475">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3475">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3476">가능한 문자 집합에서 대/소문자를 구분하지 않는 한 문자, 즉 등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3476">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3477">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록자 성 또는 '9' 자리의 첫 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3477">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3478">7자리 숫자, 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3478">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3479">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3480">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3483">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3483">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3484">검색된 `Keyword_dea_number` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3484">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3485">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3486">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3486">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3487">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3488">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3489">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3491">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3491">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3492">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3492">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3493">약 시행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3493">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3494">약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3494">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3495">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3495">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3496">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3497">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3497">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3499">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3499">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3500">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3500">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3501">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3501">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3502">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3503">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3506">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3506">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3507">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3633">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3633">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3634">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3635">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3636">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3637">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3638">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3639">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3641">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3641">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3643">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3643">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3644">생년월일과 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1~2세대, 1-2세대, 3-4: 20년, 5~6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3644">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3645">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3645">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3646">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3646">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3647">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3647">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3648">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3649">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3649">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3650">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3652">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3652">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3653">키워드가  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3653">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3654">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3655">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3655">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3688">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3688">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3689">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3690">1개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3690">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3692">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3692">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3693">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3694">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3694">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3697">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3697">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3698">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3698">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3699">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3699">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3701">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3702">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3720">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3720">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3721">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3722">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3722">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3724">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3724">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3725">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3726">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3729">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3729">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3730">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3731">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3731">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3732">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3732">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3733">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3733">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3734">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3734">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3735">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3735">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-3736">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-3736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4184">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4184">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4186">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4186">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4187">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4188">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4189">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4189">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4190">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4190">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4192">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4194">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4195">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4195">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4196">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4327">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4327">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4328">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4328">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4329">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4329">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4330">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4330">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4331">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4331">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4332">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4332">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4333">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4333">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4334">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4335">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4335">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4337">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4337">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4338">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4338">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4339">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4339">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4340">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4340">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4341">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4345">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4345">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4346">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4346">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4364">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4364">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4365">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4366">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 더한 세 자리 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4366">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4368">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4368">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4369">생년월일 형식 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4369">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4370">century marker('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4370">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4371">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4371">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4372">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4372">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4373">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4374">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4374">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4375">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4376">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4376">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4377">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4377">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4378">찾은 Keyword_finnish_national_id 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4378">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4379">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4379">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4380">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4381">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4381">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4382">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4382">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4431">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4431">Finland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4432">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4432">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4433">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4433">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4434">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4435">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4435">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4436">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4436">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4437">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4437">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4438">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4439">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4439">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4440">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4442">정규식은 Regex_finland_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4442">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4443">검색된 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4443">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4444">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4444">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4464">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4464">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4465">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4466">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4466">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4467">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4468">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4468">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4469">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4470">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4473">이 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4473">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4474">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4474">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4601">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4601">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4602">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4603">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4604">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4605">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4606">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4607">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4608">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4609">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4609">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4610">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4611">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4611">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4612">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4612">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4613">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4613">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4614">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4614">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4615">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4615">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4616">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4616">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4617">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4621">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4621">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4622">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4622">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4623">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4623">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4625">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4625">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4626">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4626">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4627">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4627">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4628">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4628">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4629">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4630">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4630">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4631">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4632">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4632">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4633">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4634">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4634">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4635">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4636">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4636">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4637">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4637">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4638">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4638">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4639">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4639">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4643">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4643">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4644">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4644">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4645">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4645">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4651">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4651">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4652">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4652">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4653">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4653">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4654">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4655">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4655">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4657">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4657">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4658">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4658">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4659">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4659">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4660">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4660">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4661">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4662">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4663">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4665">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4665">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4666">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4666">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4667">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4667">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4668">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4668">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4669">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4669">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4670">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4670">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4671">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4671">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4672">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4672">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4673">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4673">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4674">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4674">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4675">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4675">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4676">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4676">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4677">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4677">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4678">೺೺೺臲</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4678">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4679">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4679">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4680">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4680">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4681">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4681">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4682">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4682">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4683">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4683">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4684">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4684">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4685">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4685">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4686">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4686">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4687">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4687">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4688">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 및 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4688">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4689">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4690">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4690">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4691">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4692">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4692">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4693">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4693">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4694">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4694">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4695">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4695">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4696">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4699">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4700">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4700">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4701">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4701">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4704">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4705">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4705">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4706">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4707">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4707">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4708">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4708">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4709">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4709">insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4712">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4712">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4713">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4713">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4714">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4714">numéro d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-4715">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-4715">no d'identité</span></span>
