- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5657">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5657">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5658">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5658">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5659">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5659">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5660">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5660">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5661">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5661">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5662">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5662">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5663">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5663">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5664">útlevél szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5664">útlevél szám</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5665">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5665">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5666">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5667">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5667">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5668">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5668">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5669">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5669">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5670">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5674">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5674">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5675">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5675">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5677">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5677">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5678">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5678">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5687">taj #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5687">taj#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5688">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5688">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5689">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5689">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5690">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5690">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5691">áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5691">áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5692">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5692">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5693">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5693">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5694">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5694">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5695">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5695">áfa szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5696">magyar áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5696">magyar áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5697">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5697">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5698">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5698">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5699">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5699">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5700">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5700">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5701">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5701">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5702">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5702">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5703">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5703">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5704">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5705">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5705">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5707">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5707">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5708">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5708">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5709">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5709">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5710">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5711">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5712">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5713">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5714">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5715">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5716">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5718">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5744">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5744">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5745">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5745">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5746">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5746">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5747">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5747">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5748">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5748">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5749">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5749">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5750">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5750">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5751">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5752">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5752">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5754">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5754">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5755">2개 문자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5755">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5756">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5756">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5757">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5757">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5758">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5762">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5762">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5763">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5763">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5765">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5765">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5766">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5766">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5767">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5767">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5768">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5768">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5770">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5770">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5771">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5771">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5772">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5772">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5773">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5773">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5774">부가가치세 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5774">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5775">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5775">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5776">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5776">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5777">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5777">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5778">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5778">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5779">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5779">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5780">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5781">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5781">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5783">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5783">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5784">3개의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5784">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5785">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 림)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5785">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5786">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5786">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5787">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5787">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5788">문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5788">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5789">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5790">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5793">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5793">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5794">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5794">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5796">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5796">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5797">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5797">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5799">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5799">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5800">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5800">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5801">인도 고유 식별(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5801">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5802">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5803">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5803">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5805">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5805">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5806">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5806">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5807">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5807">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5808">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5808">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5809">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5809">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5810">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5810">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5811">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5811">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5812">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5813">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5814">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5816">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5816">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5817">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5817">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5818">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5818">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5819">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5820">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5821">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5822">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5824">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5824">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5825">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5825">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5826">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5826">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5827">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5827">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5828">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5828">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5829">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5829">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5830">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5830">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5831">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5832">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5832">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5834">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5834">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5835">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5835">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5836">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5836">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5837">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5837">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5838">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5838">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5839">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5839">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5840">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5840">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5841">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5841">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5842">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5842">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5843">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5844">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5845">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5846">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5847">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5847">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5848">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5848">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5849">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5849">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5851">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5851">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5854">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5854">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5855">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5856">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5856">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5858">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5858">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5859">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5859">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5860">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5860">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5861">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5861">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5862">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5862">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5863">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5863">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5864">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5864">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5866">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5870">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5870">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5871">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5872">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5872">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5873">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5873">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5874">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5874">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5875">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5876">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5876">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5878">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5878">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5879">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5880">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5881">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5882">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5882">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5883">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5883">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5884">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5884">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5886">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5886">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5887">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5887">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5888">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5888">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5889">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5889">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5890">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5890">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5891">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5891">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5892">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5892">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5893">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5893">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5894">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5894">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5895">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5895">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5896">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5896">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5897">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5898">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5899">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5900">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5900">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5901">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5901">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5902">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5902">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5903">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5903">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5904">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5904">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5905">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5906">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5906">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5907">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5907">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5908">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5908">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5909">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5909">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5910">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5910">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5911">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5911">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5912">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5912">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5913">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5913">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5914">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5914">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5915">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5915">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5916">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5917">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5920">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5920">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5921">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5921">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5922">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5922">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5923">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5923">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5924">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5924">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5925">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5925">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5926">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5926">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5927">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5927">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5928">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5928">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5929">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5929">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5930">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5930">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5931">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5931">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5932">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5932">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5933">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5933">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5934">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5934">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5935">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5935">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5936">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5936">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5937">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5938">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5938">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5939">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5940">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5940">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5941">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5941">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5942">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5942">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5943">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5944">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5944">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5945">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5946">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5947">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5947">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5948">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5948">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-5971">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-5971">drivers license</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6069">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6069">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6070">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6070">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6071">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6071">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6072">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6072">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6073">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6074">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6074">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6075">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6076">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6076">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6077">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6077">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6078">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6078">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6079">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6080">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6081">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6082">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6082">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6083">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6083">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6084">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6084">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6085">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6085">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6086">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6086">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6087">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6088">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6112">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6112">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6113">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6114">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6114">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6115">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6115">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6116">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6116">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6117">7자리 숫자와 2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6117">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6118">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6119">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6119">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6120">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6120">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6121">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6121">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6122">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6122">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6123">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6123">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6124">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6124">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6125">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6125">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6126">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6127">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6129">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6130">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6130">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6131">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6131">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6132">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6133">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6134">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6135">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6135">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6180">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6180">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6181">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6182">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6182">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6184">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6184">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6185">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6185">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6186">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6186">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6187">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6187">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6188">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6188">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6189">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6189">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6190">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6190">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6191">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6191">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6192">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6193">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6193">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6196">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6196">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6197">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6197">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6198">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6198">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6204">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6204">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6205">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6206">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6206">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6208">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6208">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6209">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6210">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6210">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6211">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6212">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6213">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6213">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6214">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6214">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6215">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6223">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6223">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6225">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6225">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6226">idnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6226">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6227">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6227">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6228">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6228">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6229">identitynumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6229">identitynumber#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6234">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6234">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6235">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6236">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6236">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6238">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6238">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6239">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6239">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6240">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6240">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6241">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6241">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6242">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6242">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6243">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6244">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6244">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6247">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6247">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6248">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6248">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6249">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6249">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6251">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6251">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6252">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6252">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6253">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6253">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6254">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6254">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6255">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6255">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6256">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6256">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6257">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6257">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6258">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6258">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6259">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6259">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6260">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6260">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6261">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6261">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6262">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6262">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6263">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6264">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6264">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6266">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6266">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6267">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6267">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6268">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6268">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6269">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6269">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6270">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6270">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6271">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 2자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6271">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6272">사람이 태어났던 시정구와 관련한 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6272">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6273">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6273">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6274">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6275">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6278">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6278">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6279">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6279">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6281">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6281">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6282">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6282">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6283">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6283">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6284">codice 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6284">codice fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6285">codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6285">codice fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6286">codice id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6286">codice id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6287">codice personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6287">codice personale</span></span>
