## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6316">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6316">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6317">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6318">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6318">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6319">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6320">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6320">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6321">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6321">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6322">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6322">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6323">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6324">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6324">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6327">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6327">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6328">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6328">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6329">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6329">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6330">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6331">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6332">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6356">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6356">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6357">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6357">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6358">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6358">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6359">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6359">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6360">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6360">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6361">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6361">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6362">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6362">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6363">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6364">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6364">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6365">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6366">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6366">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6367">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6367">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6368">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6368">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6369">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6369">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6370">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6370">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6371">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6372">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6374">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6375">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6375">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6376">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6376">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6377">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6378">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6378">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6386">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6386">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6387">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6388">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6388">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6390">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6390">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6391">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6391">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6392">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6392">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6393">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6393">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6394">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6394">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6395">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6395">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6396">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6397">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6400">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6400">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6401">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6401">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6402">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6402">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6403">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6403">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6404">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6404">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6406">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6406">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6407">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6407">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6454">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6454">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6455">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6456">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6458">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6458">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6459">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6460">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6463">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6463">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6464">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6464">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6495">運転免許No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6495">運転免許No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6496">免許証No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6496">免許証No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6497">免許No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6497">免許No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6498">運転免許証 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6498">運転免許証#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6499">運転免許 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6499">運転免許#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6500">免許証 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6500">免許証#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6501">免許 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6501">免許#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6502">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6502">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6503">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6504">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6505">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6506">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6507">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6508">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6509">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6510">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6511">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6512">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6513">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6513">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6514">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6514">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6515">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6516">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6519">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6519">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6520">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6520">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6521">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6522">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6522">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6523">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6524">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6524">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6525">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6525">corporate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6527">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6527">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6528">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6528">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6529">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6529">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6530">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6530">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6531">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6531">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6532">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6532">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6533">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6533">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6534">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6534">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6535">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6535">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6536">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6536">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6537">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6537">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6538">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6538">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6539">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6539">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6540">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6540">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6541">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6542">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6543">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6543">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6545">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6545">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6546">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6546">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6547">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6547">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6548">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6548">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6549">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6549">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6550">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6550">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6551">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6552">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6555">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6556">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6556">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6557">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6558">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6558">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6559">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6559">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6560">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6560">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6561">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6561">my number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6563">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6563">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6564">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6564">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6565">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6565">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6566">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6566">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6567">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6567">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6568">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6568">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6569">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6569">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6570">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6570">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6571">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6571">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6572">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6573">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6573">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6574">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6575">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6575">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6576">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6577">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6577">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6578">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6579">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6580">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6580">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6581">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6581">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6582">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6582">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6583">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6583">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6584">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6584">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6585">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6585">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6586">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6586">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6587">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6587">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6588">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6588">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6589">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6589">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6590">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6590">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6591">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6591">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6592">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6592">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6593">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6593">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6594">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6594">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6595">旅券番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6595">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6596">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6596">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6597">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6597">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6598">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6598">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6599">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6600">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6600">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6601">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6602">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6602">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6603">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6603">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6604">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6604">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6605">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6605">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6606">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6607">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6608">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6609">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6609">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6610">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6610">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6611">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6612">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6612">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6613">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6613">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6614">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6614">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6615">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6615">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6616">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6616">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6617">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6617">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6618">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6618">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6619">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6619">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6620">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6620">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6621">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6622">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6622">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6623">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6624">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6624">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6625">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6625">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6626">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6626">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6627">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6628">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6629">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6629">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6630">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6630">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6631">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6631">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6632">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6632">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6633">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6633">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6634">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6634">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6635">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6635">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6636">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6636">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6637">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6637">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6638">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6638">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6639">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6639">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6640">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6640">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6641">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6641">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6642">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6642">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6643">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6643">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6645">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6645">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6647">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6647">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6648">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6648">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6649">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6649">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6650">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6650">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6651">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6651">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6653">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6655">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6656">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6656">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6657">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6657">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6658">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6659">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6659">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6660">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6660">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6661">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6661">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6662">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6662">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6663">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6663">Social Insurance No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6667">健保番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6667">健保番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6670">雇用保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6670">雇用保険番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6671">保険証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6671">保険証番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6672">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6672">社会保険番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6673">会保険No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6673">社会保険No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6674">社会保険</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6674">社会保険</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6675">介護保険</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6675">介護保険</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6676">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6676">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6677">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6677">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6678">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6678">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6679">厚生年金</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6679">厚生年金</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6680">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6680">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span></span>


## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6681">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6681">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6682">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6683">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6683">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6685">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6685">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6686">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6686">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6687">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6687">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6688">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6689">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6689">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6692">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6692">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6693">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6693">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6817">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6817">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6818">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6818">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6819">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6820">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6820">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6822">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6822">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6823">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6823">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6824">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6824">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6825">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6825">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6826">생년월일 세기(19세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6826">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6827">임의로 생성된 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6827">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6828">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6828">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6829">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6829">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6830">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6830">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6831">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6831">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6832">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6833">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6834">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6835">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6835">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6836">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6836">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6837">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6837">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6838">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6838">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6839">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6839">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6902">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6902">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6903">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6904">2개의 문자 또는 숫자, 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6904">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6905">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6906">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6906">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6907">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6907">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6908">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6908">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6909">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6913">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6913">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6914">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6915">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6915">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6916">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6917">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6918">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6941">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6941">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6942">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6943">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6943">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6944">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6945">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6945">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6946">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6947">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6949">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6950">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6950">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-6951">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-6951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7076">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7076">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7077">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7077">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7078">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7078">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7079">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7079">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7080">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7080">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7081">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7081">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7082">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7082">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7083">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7084">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7084">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7085">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7086">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7086">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7087">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7087">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7088">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7088">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7089">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7089">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7090">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7090">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7091">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7092">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7093">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7095">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7095">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7096">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7096">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7098">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7098">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7133">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7133">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7134">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7135">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7135">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7136">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7136">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7137">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7137">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7138">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7139">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7139">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7140">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7141">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7142">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7142">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7143">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7144">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7144">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7146">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7147">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7167">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7167">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7168">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7169">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7171">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7176">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7177">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7301">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7301">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7302">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7303">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7304">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7305">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7306">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7307">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7308">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7309">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7309">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7310">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7311">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7311">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7312">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7312">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7313">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7313">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7314">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7315">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7315">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7316">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7317">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7318">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7318">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7319">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7319">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-7321">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-7321">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
