## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8269">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8269">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8270">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8271">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8271">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8273">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8273">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8274">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8274">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8275">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8275">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8276">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8276">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8277">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8278">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8279">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8281">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8281">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8282">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8282">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8283">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8285">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8285">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8286">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8287">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8289">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8289">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8290">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8290">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8291">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8291">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8292">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8292">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8293">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8293">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8294">F 내선 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8294">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8295">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8295">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8296">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8297">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8297">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8299">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8299">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8300">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8300">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8301">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8301">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8302">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8302">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8303">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8304">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8304">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8305">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8306">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8307">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8308">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8309">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8309">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8310">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8310">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8311">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8311">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8312">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8313">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8313">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8314">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8314">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8315">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8315">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8316">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8317">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8317">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8318">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8319">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8319">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8321">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8321">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8322">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8322">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8323">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8324">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8324">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8325">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8325">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8326">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8327">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8328">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8328">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8329">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8330">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8331">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8331">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8332">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8456">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8456">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8457">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8458">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8458">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8459">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8460">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8460">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8461">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8462">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8465">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8465">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8466">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8466">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8467">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8468">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8468">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8469">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8469">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8471">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8471">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8478">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8478">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8479">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8480">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8480">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8481">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8482">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8482">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8483">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8483">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8484">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8484">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8485">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8486">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8486">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8489">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8489">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8490">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8490">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8491">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8491">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8492">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8493">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8494">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8494">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8501">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8501">nr.-pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8506">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8506">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8507">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8507">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8508">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8509">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8509">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8511">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8511">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8512">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8513">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8513">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8516">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8516">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8517">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8517">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8518">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8519">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8519">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8521">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8521">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8522">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8522">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8523">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8523">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8524">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8524">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8525">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8525">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8526">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8526">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8527">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8527">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8528">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8528">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8529">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8529">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8530">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8530">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8531">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8531">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8532">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8533">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8533">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8534">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8535">9자리 숫자 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8535">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8536">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8536">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8537">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8537">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8538">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8538">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8539">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8539">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8540">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8541">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8544">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8544">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8545">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8545">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8546">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8546">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8547">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8547">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8548">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8548">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8549">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8550">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8550">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8551">통계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8551">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8552">statistical id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8552">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8553">statistical no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8553">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8554">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8554">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8555">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8555">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8556">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8556">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8557">company id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8557">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8558">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8558">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8559">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8559">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8560">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8560">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8561">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8561">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8562">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8562">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8563">numeruregon #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8563">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8564">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8564">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8565">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8565">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8566">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8566">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8567">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8567">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8568">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8568">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8569">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8569">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8570">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8570">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8571">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8572">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8572">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8573">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8574">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8574">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8575">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8576">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8576">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8577">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8578">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8579">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8579">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8580">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8580">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8610">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8610">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8611">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8612">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8614">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8615">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8616">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8619">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8619">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8620">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8620">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8621">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8621">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8622">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8622">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8623">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8623">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8624">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8624">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8625">citizen card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8625">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8626">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8626">document number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8640">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8640">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8641">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8642">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8642">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8644">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8644">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8645">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8645">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8646">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8646">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8647">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8647">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8648">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8648">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8649">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8649">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8650">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8650">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8651">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8651">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8652">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8652">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8653">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8653">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8654">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8654">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8655">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8655">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8656">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8659">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8660">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8660">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8661">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8793">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8793">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8794">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8795">1개의 문자와 공백 또는 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8797">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8798">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8799">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8800">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8803">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8804">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8805">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8806">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8806">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8808">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8809">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8836">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8836">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8837">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8838">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8838">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8840">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8840">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8841">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8841">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8842">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8842">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8843">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8843">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8844">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8844">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8845">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8846">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8846">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8849">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8849">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8850">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8850">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8851">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8851">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8852">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8852">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8877">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8877">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8878">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8879">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8879">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8881">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8881">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8882">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8882">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8883">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8883">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8884">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8885">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8887">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8888">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8888">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-8889">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9017">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9017">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9018">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9018">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9019">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9019">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9020">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9020">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9021">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9021">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9022">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9022">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9023">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9023">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9024">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9025">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9025">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9026">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9027">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9027">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9028">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9028">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9029">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9029">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9030">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9030">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9031">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9032">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9033">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9034">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9034">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9035">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9035">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9036">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9036">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9037">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9037">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9038">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9038">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9089">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9089">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9090">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9091">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9091">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9093">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9093">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9094">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9095">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9098">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9098">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9099">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9099">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9100">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9100">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9101">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9101">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9102">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9103">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9121">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9121">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9122">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9122">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9123">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9123">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9124">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9124">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9125">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9125">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9126">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9126">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9127">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9127">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9128">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9129">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9129">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9131">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9131">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9132">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9132">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9133">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9133">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9138">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9140">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9141">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9141">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9142">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9142">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9159">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9159">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9160">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9161">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9162">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9163">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9164">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9165">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9166">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9167">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9167">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9169">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9169">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9170">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9170">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9171">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9171">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9174">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9174">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9177">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9177">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9178">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9178">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9179">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9179">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9180">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9180">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9181">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9181">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9182">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9182">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9183">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9183">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9184">passport id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9184">passport id</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9195">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9195">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9196">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9197">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9197">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9199">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9199">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9201">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9201">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9204">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9204">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9205">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9205">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9206">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9206">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9208">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9208">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9209">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9209">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9210">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9210">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9212">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9212">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9213">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9214">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9214">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9215">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9216">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9216">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9217">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9217">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9218">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9218">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9219">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9219">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9220">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9221">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9221">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9223">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9224">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9224">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9225">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9225">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9226">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9228">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9229">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9229">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9240">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9240">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9241">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9242">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9242">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9244">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9244">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9245">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9245">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9246">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9246">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9251">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9251">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-9252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-9252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
