## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10400">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10400">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10401">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10401">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10402">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10402">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10403">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10403">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10404">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10404">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10405">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10405">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10406">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10406">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10407">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10408">10자리 숫자 및 지정된 패턴의 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10408">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10409">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10410">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10410">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10411">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10411">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10412">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10412">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10413">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10413">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10414">1990년 이전 발급된 숫자의 경우 7-8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10414">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10415">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10415">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10416">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10416">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10417">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10421">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10421">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10422">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10422">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10424">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10442">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10442">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10443">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10443">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10444">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10444">taxno#</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10450">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10450">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10451">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10452">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10452">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10453">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10454">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10454">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10455">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10455">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10456">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10456">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10457">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10457">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10458">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10458">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10459">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10459">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10460">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10461">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10464">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10464">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10465">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10465">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10502">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10502">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10503">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10504">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10505">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10506">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10507">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10508">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10509">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10510">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10511">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10512">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10513">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10513">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10514">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10514">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10515">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10515">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10516">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10516">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10517">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10517">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10518">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10519">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10519">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10520">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10521">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10523">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10523">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10524">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10524">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10525">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10525">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10526">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10526">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10527">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10527">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10548">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10548">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10549">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10550">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10550">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10551">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10552">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10552">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10553">한 문자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10553">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10554">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10554">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10555">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10555">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10556">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10557">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10558">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10559">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10559">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10560">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10560">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10561">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10561">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10562">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10563">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10564">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10565">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10566">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10566">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10567">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10567">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10582">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10582">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10583">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10583">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10584">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10584">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10585">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10585">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10586">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10586">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10587">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10587">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10588">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10588">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10589">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10589">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10590">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10590">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10591">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10591">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10592">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10593">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10594">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10595">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10595">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10596">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10596">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10597">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10597">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10598">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10598">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10599">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10599">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10600">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10600">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10601">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10601">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10602">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10602">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10603">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10603">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10604">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10604">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10605">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10605">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10606">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10606">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10607">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10607">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10608">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10608">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10609">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10610">10개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10610">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10612">10개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10612">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10613">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10613">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10614">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10615">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10616">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10619">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10619">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10620">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10620">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10621">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10621">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10622">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10622">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10623">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10623">Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10625">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10625">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10626">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10626">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10627">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10627">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10628">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10628">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10629">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10629">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10630">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10630">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10631">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10631">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10632">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10632">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10633">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10633">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10634">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10634">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10635">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10636">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10636">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10637">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10638">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10639">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10639">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10640">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10640">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10641">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10642">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10643">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10644">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10645">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10645">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10646">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10646">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10648">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10648">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10649">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10649">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10650">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10650">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10651">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10651">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10652">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10652">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10653">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10653">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10654">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10654">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10655">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10655">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10656">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10656">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10657">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10657">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10658">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10659">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10659">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10661">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10661">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10662">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10663">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10664">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10665">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10666">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10666">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10667">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10667">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10668">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10669">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10669">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10670">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10670">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10671">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10671">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10672">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10672">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10673">TC Kimlik numarasmar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10673">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10674">바타르다얀크 누마라소드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10674">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10675">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10675">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10676">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10676">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10677">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10677">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10678">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10678">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10679">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10680">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10680">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10681">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10682">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10682">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10683">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10683">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10684">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10684">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10685">생년월일 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자(드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자는 50으로 증가합니다. 예를 들어 01에서 12까지는 51에서 62까지 증가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10685">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10686">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10686">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10687">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10687">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10688">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10689">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10692">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10692">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10693">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10693">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10694">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10710">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10710">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10712">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10712">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10713">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10713">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10714">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10715">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10715">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10716">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10717">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10717">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10718">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10719">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10719">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10720">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10721">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10722">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10722">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10723">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10723">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10724">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10724">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10725">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10725">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10726">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10726">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10727">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10727">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10728">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10728">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10729">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10729">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10730">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10730">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10731">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10731">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10732">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10733">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10733">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10735">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10735">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10736">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10736">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10737">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10737">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10738">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10738">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10739">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10739">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10740">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10740">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10741">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10742">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10744">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10745">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10745">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10746">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10746">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10747">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10747">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10748">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10749">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10749">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10750">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10750">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10751">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10751">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10752">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10752">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10753">국립 보건 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10753">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10754">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10754">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10755">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10755">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10756">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10756">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10757">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10757">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10758">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10758">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10759">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10759">patient identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10763">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10763">GP</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10768">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10768">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10769">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10769">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10770">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 IDentificaiton 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10771">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10772">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10772">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10774">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10774">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10775">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 패턴이 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자를 구분하지는 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10775">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10776">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10776">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10777">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 되거나)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10777">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10778">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10778">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10779">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10779">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10780">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10780">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10781">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10781">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10782">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10782">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10783">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10784">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10785">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10786">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10787">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10787">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10788">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10789">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10791">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10792">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10792">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10793">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10793">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10795">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10795">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10817">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10817">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10818">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10818">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10819">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10820">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10821">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10822">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10823">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10824">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10825">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10826">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10826">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10828">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10828">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10829">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10830">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10830">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10831">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10832">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10832">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10833">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10833">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10834">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10834">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10845">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10845">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10846">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10846">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10847">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10847">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10848">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10848">taxno#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10854">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10854">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10855">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10856">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10856">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10858">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10858">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10859">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10860">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10860">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10861">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10862">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10862">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10863">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10863">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10864">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10864">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10894">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10894">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10895">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10896">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10896">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10898">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예를 들어 뉴욕은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10898">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10899">ddd ddd d와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10899">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10900">dddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10900">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10901">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10902">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10903">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10904">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10905">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10905">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10906">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10906">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10907">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10907">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10908">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10908">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10909">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10910">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10911">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-10912">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-10912">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11010">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11010">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11011">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11012">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11012">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11014">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11014">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11015">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11015">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11016">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11016">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11017">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11017">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11018">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11018">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11019">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11019">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11020">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11020">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11021">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11021">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11022">폼이 없는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11022">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11023">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11023">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11024">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11024">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11025">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11025">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11026">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11026">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11027">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11028">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11028">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11029">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11030">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11031">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11031">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11032">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11032">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11033">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11034">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11034">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11035">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11035">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11036">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11036">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11037">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11037">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11038">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11038">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11039">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11039">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11040">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11040">taxpayer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11042">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11042">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11043">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11043">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11044">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11044">i.t.i.n.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11049">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11049">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11050">에서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11050">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11051">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11051">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11052">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11052">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11053">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11054">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11054">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11055">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11055">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11057">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 봐야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11057">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11058">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR d d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11058">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(dddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR ddd d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 포스터가 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11062">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11063">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11063">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11065">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11066">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11066">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11067">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11067">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11069">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11069">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11070">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11070">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11072">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11072">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11073">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11073">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11074">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11074">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11075">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11075">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11076">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```
