## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11091">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11091">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11092">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11092">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11093">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11093">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11094">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11094">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11095">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11096">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11096">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11098">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11098">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11099">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11100">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11100">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11102">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11102">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11103">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11103">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11104">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11104">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11125">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11125">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11126">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11126">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11127">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11127">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11128">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11128">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11129">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11129">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11130">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11130">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11131">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11131">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11132">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11133">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11133">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11135">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11135">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11136">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11137">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11140">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11140">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11141">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11141">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11142">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11142">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11143">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11143">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11144">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11144">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11145">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11145">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11147">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11147">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11148">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11148">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11149">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11149">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11150">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11150">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11151">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11151">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11152">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11152">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11153">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11153">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11154">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11154">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11155">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11155">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11156">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11156">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11157">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11158">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11158">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11159">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11160">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11160">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11161">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11161">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11162">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11162">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11163">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11167">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11167">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ba4d5-11168">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ba4d5-11168">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
